title: Indira Gandhi Sports Complex || Sports Authority of India
content: Indira Gandhi Sports Complex || Sports Authority of India Cancel Preloader 0 104 एकड़ (420873.44 वर्ग मीटर) भूमि क्षेत्रफल Indira Gandhi Sports Complex Facilities Contact Us Gymnastic Hall wooden floor (fully AC) with 15000 fixed seats. Wrestling Hall (fully AC) with 5000 fixed seats. Cycling Velodrome (fully AC) with 3000 fixed seats. Available sports facilities - Badminton, Basketball, Boxing, Cricket, Cycling, Gymnastic, Judo, Table Tennis, speak takraw, Wushu, & Wrestling, recreational track for cycling and walking, Fitness Centre, Billiard & Snooker Table. 140 bedded Sports Hostel. Recreational and Health Lifestyle facilities: Sauna Bath and Massage Centre which is being used by National Campers and Elite Sports Person. Medical Centre with consisting of following three major units: Sports Medicine Unit Sports Rehabilitation & Post Exercise Recovery Services Sports Physiotherapy & Nutritionist Name: Sh. Atul Kumar Singh Designation: Administrator Phone: 011-23392729 Email: igsc[dot]sai[at]gov[dot]in Address: Indira Gandhi Stadium Complex, Inder Prastha Estate, Delhi -110002 Sports Authority of India Gallery Book This Stadium Read More
